code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faSmile}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import EmojiPicker from'emoji-picker-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MessageInput(_ref){let{sendMessage}=_ref;const[messageInput,setMessageInput]=useState("");const[selectedEmoji,setSelectedEmoji]=useState(null);const[showEmojiPicker,setShowEmojiPicker]=useState(false);const handleEmojiClick=(event,emojiObject)=>{setSelectedEmoji(emojiObject.emoji);};const handleClickSend=()=>{sendMessage(messageInput,selectedEmoji);setMessageInput("");setSelectedEmoji(null);};const toggleEmojiPicker=()=>{setShowEmojiPicker(!showEmojiPicker);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emoji-icon",onClick:toggleEmojiPicker,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSmile})}),showEmojiPicker&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmojiPicker,{onEmojiClick:handleEmojiClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type your message....",value:messageInput,onChange:e=>setMessageInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClickSend,children:"Send"})]});}export default MessageInput;
